page.title: 13LADHOPE GOLF COURSE
page.content: LADHOPE GOLF COURSE IS MAINTAINED BY THE COUNCIL. THIS COURSE ON LADHOPE HILL IS THE ONLY 18 HOLE GOLF COURSE IN ETTRICK AND LAUDERDALE.THE HILL IS VERY POPULAR FOR EXERCISING DOGS AND HORSES.WALKERS ALSO FREQUENTLY TAKE THIS ROUTE TO HIGH BUCKHOLM AS THERE IS A GOOD VIEW OF THE TOWN FROM THERE. THERE ARE TWO CLUBS-LADHOPE GOLF CLUB, GALASHIELS BAKERS GOLF CLUB.THE LATTER WAS FORMED ORIGINALLY BY THE BAKERS OF GALASHIELS WHO TRADITIONALLY HAD A WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON OFF AND THIS IS WHEN THEY STILL PLAY MOST OF THEIR GAMES.IT IS QUITE A HILLY COURSE WHICH SOME PEOPLE DESCRIBE AS A 'GOAT'S COURSE'!
